io.github.ammar257ammar.psnpbind.core

Class Ligand3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.ammar257ammar.psnpbind.core.Ligand3D

  • public class Ligand3D
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to prepare ligands folder structure and prepare a dataset of ligands ChEMBL IDs and Tanimoto similarities
    Author:
    Ammar Ammar

      • prepareLigandsFolder

        public static void prepareLigandsFolder(java.lang.String foldxPath,
                                        java.lang.String pdbEntriesPath,
                                        java.lang.String output)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        A method to generate folder structure and ligands files for OpenBabel
        Parameters:
        foldxPath - the path for FoldX folder where selected PDBbind entries reside
        pdbEntriesPath - the PdbBind entries folder path to get the original ligands files
        output - the ligands output folder to be used by OpenBabel
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case of error in IO operations

      • getLigandIDsFromFiles

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> getLigandIDsFromFiles(java.lang.String ligandsPath)
                                                                throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                                       java.io.IOException
        A method to extract ChEMBL IDs from the similar ligands SDF files selected with OpenBabel
        Parameters:
        ligandsPath - the OpenBabel-selected ligands folder path
        Returns:
        a list of string arrays holding the ligands file names and IDs
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case of error in IO operations
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - in case file not found

      • getLigandsIDsFiltered

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> getLigandsIDsFiltered(java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> similarLigands,
                                                                       boolean keepall)
        A method to remove duplicated ligands from a selected ChEMBL IDs list
        Parameters:
        similarLigands - the OpenBabel-selected ligands list
        keepall - if true, duplicates will not be removed
        Returns:
        a list of string arrays holding the filtered ligands names and IDs

      • getLigandsIDsFiltered

                                                                       boolean keepall)
                                                                throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                                       java.io.IOException
        A wrapper method to extract ChEMBL IDs from the similar ligands and remove duplicates
        Parameters:
        ligandsPath - the OpenBabel-selected ligands folder path
        keepall - if true, duplicates will not be removed
        Returns:
        a list of string arrays holding the filtered ligands names and IDs
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case of error in IO operations
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - in case file not found

      • combineIDsAndTanimotoOfLigands

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> combineIDsAndTanimotoOfLigands(java.lang.String ligandsPath,
                                                                                java.lang.String idsFile,
                                                                                boolean keepall)
                                                                         throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                                                java.io.IOException
        A method to combine ligands information with Tanimoto similarity
        Parameters:
        ligandsPath - the OpenBabel-selected ligands folder path
        idsFile - ligands IDs file
        keepall - if true, duplicates will not be removed
        Returns:
        a list of string arrays holding the filtered ligands names, IDs and Tanimoto similarity
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case of error in IO operations
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - in case file not found

      • combineIDsAndTanimotoAndSmilesOfLigands

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> combineIDsAndTanimotoAndSmilesOfLigands(java.lang.String ligandsPath,
                                                                                         java.lang.String idsFile,
                                                                                         boolean keepall)
                                                                                  throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                                                         java.io.IOException
        A method to combine ligands information with Tanimoto similarity and SMILES
        Parameters:
        ligandsPath - the OpenBabel-selected ligands folder path
        idsFile - ligands IDs file
        keepall - if true, duplicates will not be removed
        Returns:
        a list of string arrays holding the filtered ligands names, IDs, Tanimoto similarity and SMILES
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case of error in IO operations
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - in case file not found
